name: Akasha Academy Demo
description:
A wholesome visual novel that puts you in the seat of Clotho, a young teacher who has just landed a role at the prestigous Akasha Academy.

In this Academy you'll come across a variety of unique and quirky students who will want to get to know you! Get to know your students, what they like, what troubles them, and provide them with a school experience they will cherish.

It isn't all about the students though, throughout the story you will get to learn more about Clotho and what family means to her.  Your decisions will have an impact on who Clotho is as a person and what she wants to pursue.

This game is still in development.

This game is Non-commercial.
